blogPost.excerpt: Project Lightspeed is a self contained live streaming server. With Lightspeed you will be able to deploy your own sub-second latency streaming site. The Lightspeed repository contains the instructions for installing and deploying the entire application.
blogPost.body: Project Lightspeed is a self contained live streaming server. With Lightspeed you will be able to deploy your own sub-second latency streaming site. The Lightspeed repository contains the instructions for installing and deploying the entire application.
blogPost.title: Project Lightspeed - a sub-second, open source, self hosted stream from OBS
blogPost.author: Garrett Graves

localize.description: Project LightSpeed是一个独立的直播服务器。使用LightSpeed，您将能够部署自己的亚秒级延迟流媒体站点。LightSpeed存储库包含安装和部署整个应用程序的说明。
localize.tagline: 来自OBS的次秒级开源自托管流

localize.description: Project LightSpeed是一個獨立的直播服務器。使用LightSpeed，您將能夠部署自己的亞秒級延遲流媒體站點。LightSpeed存儲庫包含安裝和部署整個應用程序的說明。
localize.tagline: 來自OBS的次秒級開源自託管流

previous.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
previous.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site

localize.description: RecipeCart是一个免费的扩展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您显示食谱。打印、保存或将食谱发送到您的手机。在幕后，我们使用ML来确定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的确切配料+数量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食谱网站上即时查看食谱或订购食材

localize.description: RecipeCart是一個免費的擴展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您顯示食譜。打印、保存或將食譜發送到您的手機。在幕後，我們使用ML來確定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的確切配料+數量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食譜網站上即時查看食譜或訂購食材

next.excerpt: An app to help you plan your real-world and digital social events. By combining event creation, calendars, group chats and information sharing, Herdd puts everything in one place making planning your social events seamless and stress-free.
next.title: Herdd - An app to help plan your social events.

localize.description: 一款帮助您计划现实世界和数字社交活动的应用程序。通过将活动创建、日历、群聊和信息共享结合在一起，Herdd将所有内容放在一个地方，使您可以无缝、无压力地计划您的社交活动。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助您计划社交活动的应用程序。

localize.description: 一款幫助您計劃現實世界和數字社交活動的應用程序。通過將活動創建、日曆、羣聊和信息共享結合在一起，Herdd將所有內容放在一個地方，使您可以無縫、無壓力地計劃您的社交活動。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助您計劃社交活動的應用程序。
